title: Your Fitness Dashboard
description: Track your workout progress, analyze your fitness stats, and monitor your token earnings in your personalized FixieRun dashboard.

sections.title: Activity Summary
sections.description: View a summary of your recent workout activities including distance, duration, and calories burned.

sections.title: Token Earnings
sections.description: Track your token earnings from workouts, challenges, and achievements.

sections.title: Achievements & Milestones
sections.description: View your fitness achievements, NFT collections, and milestone progress.

sections.title: Performance Analytics
sections.description: Analyze detailed statistics about your workouts to improve your performance.

sections.title: Active Challenges
sections.description: View and participate in ongoing fitness challenges with the community.

metrics.name: Total Distance
metrics.description: Total distance covered across all your activities.

metrics.name: Active Days
metrics.description: Number of days with recorded activity.

metrics.name: Calories Burned
metrics.description: Total calories burned across all activities.

metrics.name: Token Balance
metrics.description: Current balance of fitness tokens earned.

metrics.name: NFTs Collected
metrics.description: Number of fitness achievement NFTs collected.

charts.title: Weekly Activity Chart
charts.description: Visual representation of your activity levels throughout the week.

charts.title: Fitness Progress Chart
charts.description: Track your fitness improvements over time.

charts.title: Token Earnings History
charts.description: View your token earning history and trends.
